name: Saga Lundqvist
personality: Reckless, loyal, sarcastic. Runs on caffeine and unresolved parental trauma.
background: Once a junior national hopeful. Now juggling Twitch fame, ride-or-die debt, and a mom on a failing neural implant. Selling blood plasma and dignity to fund dreams.
physical_description: Short, jagged haircut. Scar on left cheek from an actual wolf. Always bruised, always laughing too loud.
dialogue_style: Every sentence sounds like she’s daring you to disagree. Swears with Olympic precision.

relationships.Elin Voss: Mother figure she doesn't want to disappoint, ever.
relationships.Freja Holm: Frenemies. Fight like sisters. Protect each other like wolves.
relationships.Mira Nguyen: Teases constantly. Secretly terrified of letting her down.

static_attributes.augmentation_level: Moderate – neural shifter implant (stuck in 3rd gear)

training_philosophy: If you’re not bleeding, you’re wasting time
